record.name: TLP
record.description:
Table Autoformat Look sPecifier (TLP).

Class and fields descriptions are quoted from Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format
record.author: Sergey Vladimirov; according to Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format Specification [*.doc]

field.name: itl
field.description: Index to Wordâ€˜s table of table looks (see itl table below)

bit.name: fBorders
bit.description: When == 1, use the border properties from the selected table look

bit.name: fShading
bit.description: When == 1, use the shading properties from the selected table look

bit.name: fFont
bit.description: When == 1, use the font from the selected table look

bit.name: fColor
bit.description: When == 1, use the color from the selected table look

bit.name: fBestFit
bit.description: When == 1, do best fit from the selected table look

bit.name: fHdrRows
bit.description: When == 1, apply properties from the selected table look to the header rows in the table

bit.name: fLastRow
bit.description: When == 1, apply properties from the selected table look to the last row in the table
